title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2529.4 - Service and filing of a PAR
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2529.4 - Service and filing of a PAR
State Regulations
(a) Each PAR shall be filed in an original and one copy at the Division of Housing
and Community Renewal, Office of Rent Administration, 92-31 Union Hall Street, Jamaica, NY 11433, unless otherwise provided on the form prescribed by the
commissioner for such PAR. (b) A
copy of the PAR shall be served by the DHCR upon the adverse party. (c) A PAR will not be accepted for filing
unless accompanied by a complete copy of the order to be reviewed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2529.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
